page.description: Apply a set of changes started with BeginTransaction.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::CommitTransaction() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .CommitTransaction() ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object.
Description The CommitTransaction() method applies a set of changes started with SQL::Connection::BeginTransaction(). Limitations Example Refer to SQL::Connection::BeginTransaction(). See Also SQL::Connection Object
